title: Buckingham
name: Buckingham Old Gaol
directions: right in the heart of the town centre, looking like a small castle
price: Adults £3.50, Children £2.00 (under fives free), Family ticket £9.00 (2 adults and up to 3 children)
content: The purpose-built 1748 prison, extended by the famous architect George Gilbert Scott in 1839 is now the town museum (including a Flora Thompson exhibition) and houses tourist information centre.
